title: CalSched
blurb: Privacy-first calendar scheduling and availability engine with CalDAV/ICS support, smart constraints, and sane defaults.
description: CalSched integrates with CalDAV/ICS sources and major calendars to provide privacy-respecting booking links, round-robin team routing, and robust constraints (buffer/lead times, daily caps, blackout windows, and working hours). Itâ€™s API-first, self-hostable, and designed for audited logs and minimal data retention.
